_meanings:
A name given
to certain sacred writings in verse
(often in the form of a dialogue)
which are devoted to the exposition
of particular religious and 
theosophical doctrines; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#SivagItA#}, 
{#rAmagItA, BagavadgItA#}. But the name 
appears to be especially confined 
tothe last, the Bhagavadgītā;  
{#gItAsugItA kartavyA kimanyEH SAstravistarEH .#}
{#yA svayaM padmanABasya muKapadmAdviniHsftA ..#}
quoted by Śrīdharasvāmin.
